async createCollections() {
      // 'user' collection reference (table)
      const colRef = collection(db, 'users')
      // data to send
      const dataObj = {
        firstName: 'Fülöp',
        lastName: 'Gergely',
        email: 'biciklipumpa@gmail.com',
        score: 0,
        test_id: 123
      }
      // create document and return reference to it (rekord)
      const docRef = await addDoc(collection(db, 'users'), dataObj)
      // acces auto-generated ID with 'id'
      console.log('létrehozva egy Doc ezzel az id-vel: ', docRef.id)

      
      await addDoc(collection(db, 'tests'), {
        programmingLanguageName: 'js',
        test_id: 123,
        testDurationMinutes: 30,
      })

      await addDoc(collection(db, 'admin'), {
        name: 'kvizmester42'
      })

    },
